combinationSkills.name: Magic Blast
combinationSkills.description: [Foes] Non-Elem. M.Attack activates aft. S.A Combos by 2+ Ascension-unlocked Units w/same Comb. Attack. ※ Can be Units of same character.

combinationSkills.name: Holy Rage
combinationSkills.description: [Foes] Non-Elem. M.Attack activates aft. S.A Combos by 2+ Ascension upgraded(x3+) Units w/same Comb. Attack. ※ Cannot be Units of same character.

combatSkills.name: Crater Hellion
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Ultra Fire M.Attack w/temp. Mag. Boost and Hi Unguard Rate & Dmg. (Attack Type: Single Target)+20%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Heart Fire
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Lo Fire M.Attack & [Self] Mag. and Fire Attack Dmg.+40%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Courage
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Mid Fire M.Attack & [Allies] P.Resist and M.Resist+20%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Scorch
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Hi Fire M.Attack & [Foe] P.Resist, M.Resist and Fire Resist-20%/4 turns

passiveSkills.name: Fire Manifestation
passiveSkills.description: Wind Resist+25%. When countering and attacking, regular M.Attack a Foe with Fire Element.
